Function Documentation

int cvmx_agl_set_backpressure_override ( uint32_t  interface,
uint32_t  port_mask 
)

Disables the sending of flow control (pause) frames on the specified AGL (RGMII) port(s).

Parameters:
interface Which interface (0 or 1)
port_mask Mask (4bits) of which ports on the interface to disable backpressure on. 1 => disable backpressure 0 => enable backpressure
Returns:
0 on success -1 on error
